fields.value: The Unit Code controls the main text in the banner.  Use the 4 letter code or unitname|unittype|location. The link is automatic for all valid codes.

To hide the header add '&embed' to the end of the URL

fields.label: Bookmarks:

fields.label: Color Order:

fields.label: Ignore Layers:
fields.tooltip: Specify point layer(s) in your map that do NOT define a tab in the Shortlist. If there's more than one layer, use the '|' character as delimiter

fields.label: Clickable Layers:
fields.tooltip: Specify layer(s) in your map that will be clickable in the Shortlist. If there's more than one layer, use the '|' character as delimiter

fields.label: Pan Percent:
fields.tooltip: Percent of the Height/Width to pan with each arrow key

fields.label: Details Panel

fields.label: Show Locator
fields.tooltip: Show a location button that shows/hides the user's GPS location (on supported browsers)
